holidays.title: National Stay Out of the Sun Day
holidays.description: Hang up your beach towels, don your coziest attire and prepare for a Netflix marathon.

holidays.title: Air Conditioning Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the Air Conditioning Appreciation Days from July 3 to August 15.

holidays.title: American Redneck Day
holidays.description: Find out about redneck culture and get into the swing of things on this fun day.

holidays.title: Asalha Puja
holidays.description: Asalha Puja commemorates Buddha's first sermon after enlightenment.

holidays.title: Belarus Independence Day
holidays.description: Love festivities? Find out how to celebrate Belarusian culture with these tips and information.

holidays.title: Disobedience Day
holidays.description: “Disobedience is the true foundation of liberty. The obedient must be slaves” — curious to know more?

holidays.title: Esala Full Moon Poya
holidays.description: Esala Full Moon Poya commemorates Buddha's first sermon, in which he uttered the Four Noble Truths.

holidays.title: Heroes' Day of Zambia
holidays.description: Today is the day to remember those who fought in the struggle for Zambia's independence.

holidays.title: International Drop a Rock Day
holidays.description: Show us how creative you can make a rock look with a theme word or phrase.

holidays.title: International Plastic Bag Free Day
holidays.description: A global initiative that aims to eliminate the use of plastic bags.

holidays.title: Mother's Day South Sudan
holidays.description: Chocolates, cards, or flowers — however you choose to thank your mother, make sure she is pampered.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Wafer Day
holidays.description: They are light, crispy, and simply delicious! We are talking about everyone’s favorite — chocolate wafers.

holidays.title: National Compliment Your Mirror Day
holidays.description: This day motivates us to look in the mirror and recognize everything that make us exceptional.

holidays.title: National Eat Beans Day
holidays.description: “I am a bean, very lean. I am not fat, I’m sure of that.”

holidays.title: National Fried Clam Day
holidays.description: For New Englanders, an addiction to fried clams is a rite of passage.

holidays.title: National Independent Beer Run Day
holidays.description: Show your Independence Day spirit and support the small craft brewers.

holidays.title: St Thomas History
holidays.description: On The Feast of St Thomas Day, we celebrate his role in Christianity.

holidays.title: StartTheConversation Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Start the Conversation Day by raising awareness to check up on people's mental health.

holidays.title: The Feast of Saints Peter and Paul
holidays.description: We celebrate this day as part of a solemn reminder of Christianity’s history.

holidays.title: V.I. Emancipation Day
holidays.description: The V.I Emancipation Day honors the liberation of enslaved black people in the West Indies islands.

holidays.title: Brooklyn Queen’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented young rapper, dancer, and actress, this is just the beginning.

holidays.title: Cameron Hamilton’s Birthday
holidays.description: Science and love are just two of Cameron Hamilton's many skills. Celebrate him today!

holidays.title: Digital Farm Animals’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this amazing D.J., nothing is stopping him from success. Celebrate him today!

holidays.title: PartyNextDoor’s Birthday
holidays.description: PartyNextDoor is a man of many talents — singer, songwriter, rapper, and producer, to mention a few.

holidays.title: Thomas Gibson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Thomas Gibson's movie debut came in 1992 when he appeared in Ron Howard's "Far and Away."

holidays.title: Tom Cruise’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing is an impossible mission for the talented and award-winning actor, Tom Cruise.
